Apos.​Input.​ConditionGamePad
Apos.​Input.​ICondition
public
Apos.​Input.​ConditionGamePad

Checks various conditions on a specific gamepad button.  Non static methods implicitly make sure that the game is active. Otherwise returns false.

Constructors
ConditionGamePad
public ConditionGamePad(
InputHelper.GamePadButton needButton,
int gamePadIndex
)
Parameters
needButton
InputHelper.GamePadButton

The button to operate on.

gamePadIndex
int

The index of the gamepad to operate on.

Public Functions
Pressed
public bool Pressed()
Returns

Returns true when a button was not pressed and is now pressed.

Held
public bool Held()
Returns

Returns true when a button is now pressed.

HeldOnly
public bool HeldOnly()
Returns

Returns true when a button was pressed and is now pressed.

Released
public bool Released()
Returns

Returns true when a button was pressed and is now not pressed.

Private Variables
_needButton
private InputHelper.GamePadButton _needButton

The button that will be checked.
